method: In a blender, combine the coconut milk, frozen mixed berries, maple syrup, and capers.
Blend until smooth and well combined.
Pour the mixture into popsicle molds.
Insert popsicle sticks into each mold.
Freeze the popsicles for at least 4 hours, or until completely frozen.
To remove the popsicles from the molds, run them under warm water for a few seconds.
